description: Try our easy to follow Choc Banana Tarts recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Choc Banana Tarts Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: To make caramel sauce, combine sugar, lemon juice and 2 tbs water in a medium saucepan. Stir over medium heat until sugar dissolves and mixture starts to simmer. Cook for 810 minutes, without stirring, until an even gold caramel colour. Remove from heat, add reserved cream and salt flakes and stir to combine. Drizzle sauce over tarts, to serve.

To make caramel sauce, combine sugar, lemon juice and 2 tbs water in a medium saucepan. Stir over medium heat until sugar dissolves and mixture starts to simmer. Cook for 810 minutes, without stirring, until an even gold caramel colour. Remove from heat, add reserved cream and salt flakes and stir to combine. Drizzle sauce over tarts, to serve.
